title: Beka Tsiklauri
text:
Beka Tsiklauri (born <a href="Tbilisi">Tbilisi</a>, February 9, 1989) is a Georgian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays as a <a href="fullback%20%28rugby%20union%29">fullback</a>.
He currently plays for <a href="RC%20Locomotive%20Tbilisi">Locomotive</a> in the <a href="Georgia%20Championship">Georgia Championship</a> and the <a href="Georgia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Georgia national team</a>.
He has 22 caps for <a href="Georgia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Georgia</a> since his debut in 2008, with 4 tries, 11 conversions, 15 penalties and 2 drop goals scored, 93 points in aggregate. He was called for the <a href="2015%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2015 Rugby World Cup</a>, playing in two games and scoring a try against the <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">All Blacks</a>.
